DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective study compare treatment ATRA TECH Implant System , OsseoSpeed™ implant maxilla postmenopausal woman without systemic osteoporosis . The hypothesis difference marginal bone level alteration two group .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating ASTRA TECH Implant System , OsseoSpeed™ Implants Upper Jaw Women With Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent Postmenopausal woman age 60 year In need 28 implant maxilla A history edentulism area implant treatment least 6 month . A BMD value suitable either group A group B : Group A ( Osteoporosis/osteopenia ) : BMD least 2 standard deviation mean peak bone density young adult spine total hip ( Tscore = 2SD le ) . Absolute value ( g/cm2 ) use . Group B ( Control ) : BMD 1 standard deviation mean peak bone density young adult spine total hip ( Tscore = 1SD ) . Absolute value ( g/cm2 ) use . Unlikely able comply study procedure , judge investigator . Untreated , uncontrolled caries and/or periodontal disease Known suspect current malignancy History chemotherapy within 5 year prior surgery History radiation head neck region History metabolic bone disease , e.g . Paget 's disease , hyperparathyroidism , fibrous dysplasia osteomalacia A medical history make implant insertion unfavourable Need systemic corticosteroid Current previous use intravenous bisphosphonates ( esp . zoledronic acid ) Current previous use oral bisphosphonates History bone graft and/or sinus lift plan implant area Current need bone graft and/or sinus lift plan implant area Present alcohol and/or drug abuse Involvement planning conduct study ( applies Astra Tech AB staff staff study site ) Previous enrolment present study . Participation clinical study last 6 month .
